spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 95,715 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Silken Advisor's Favor
description: To my most trusted advisors for their loyalty, wisdom, and above all - unity.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Fashion nearby garbage into a sphere and launch it into the sky. After 3 sec of gathering momentum the sphere crashes into the targeted location dealing 1.8 million Physical damage split between all enemies in the area. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your harmful spells have a high chance to resonate with a dark ritual, storing magic within the emblem.
Use: Complete the ritual, unleashing a horrific blast that deals 122,737 Shadow damage to your target per magic stored up to 1.2 million . (1 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
